page.title: 05Gargrave, Education.
page.content: {Gargrave Primary School}is the only school in the village. Opened in 1976 with 170 pupils, it now only uses 4 of the 5 classrooms, as there are only 93 children at present. There are 4 teachers + 1 part-time, a secretary, a non-teaching assistant, a dining supervisor, 3 Kitchen staff and a caretaker. All but the teachers have had severe cuts in their working hours recently. The school is set in its own playing fields between the main road and the canal, and this year won the Skipton Primary Schools 7-a-side football competition. Children leaving this school are selected for{Secondary Education}by means of the 'Thorne Scheme'for either Skipton Girls' High School, Ermysted's Grammar School or Aireville County Secondary School, in Skipton.
